mapper.sql: select id, vehicle_id, tunnel_id, vehicle_type, vehicle_color, longitude, latitude, speed, lane_num, course_angle, vehicle_license, license_color, stake_num, detect_time from sd_radar_detect_data_temporary

id, vehicle_id, tunnel_id, vehicle_type, vehicle_color, longitude, latitude, speed, lane_num, course_angle, vehicle_license, license_color, stake_num, detect_time, object_type, road_dir, record_Serial_Number, distance, create_time
